All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
Direct Known Subclasses:
BrowseDiscsServlet, CheckoutServlet, DiscManagementServlet, LoginServlet, RegisterServlet, ShoppingCartServlet, UserManagementServlet, WarehouseServlet, ViewDiscServlet, ViewOrdersServlet
public abstract class BaseServlet
extends org.apache.velocity.servlet.VelocityServlet

A base class that all the other servlets extend. The class itself extends VelocityServlet.

Version:
$Id: BaseServlet.java,v 1.1 2002/12/04 13:06:31 foo Exp $
Author:
Jari Aarniala (jari.aarniala@cs.helsinki.fi)
See Also:
VelocityServlet, Serialized Form

process

public abstract java.lang.String process(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req,
                                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp,
                                         org.apache.velocity.context.Context context)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
All subclasses of this servlet must implement their logic in this method and return the name of the template that should be shown.

Parameters:
req - the http request
resp - the http response
context - the velocity context
Returns:
the name of the template to render, i.e. "disc.vm"
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - if something goes wrong
